short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple yet powerful notepad extension built for Chromium browsers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notes: Jot down ideas, tasks, or reminders with a few clicks.

Folders: Keep your notes well-organized and easy to locate.

Editing: Modify and update your notes with ease, ensuring that they are always current.

Customizability: Change the primary color of the extension to match your preferences.
